tasks.title: Develop MVP features
tasks.description: Implement the core features required for the Minimum Viable Product.

tasks.title: Refactor codebase
tasks.description: Improve code structure and optimize performance.

tasks.title: Implement user feedback
tasks.description: Incorporate user feedback and make necessary adjustments.

tasks.title: Design database schema
tasks.description: Create a well-structured database schema for the application.

tasks.title: Integrate third-party APIs
tasks.description: Connect the application with external APIs for additional functionality.

tasks.title: Write automated tests
tasks.description: Create test cases to ensure the reliability of the application.

tasks.title: Deploy to production
tasks.description: Release the application to the production environment.

tasks.title: Plan social media campaigns
tasks.description: Create strategies for promoting the product on various social media platforms.

tasks.title: Collaborate with influencers
tasks.description: Partner with influencers to reach a wider audience.

tasks.title: Create marketing materials
tasks.description: Design and produce marketing materials such as brochures and banners.

tasks.title: Run Google Ads campaign
tasks.description: Set up and manage advertising campaigns on Google Ads.

tasks.title: Organize product launch event
tasks.description: Plan and execute a launch event to create buzz around the product.

tasks.title: Analyze marketing metrics
tasks.description: Monitor and analyze key performance indicators to evaluate the effectiveness of marketing efforts.

tasks.title: Generate marketing reports
tasks.description: Compile data and create reports to present the results of marketing campaigns.
